edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.Filter

    • Uses of Filter in edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter

      Subclasses of Filter in edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActiveContourFilter
      A Filter that takes an image and segments it using an active contour-based method.
      class  AntiseedFilter
      This class is a Filter that removes regions in one mask that overlap with regions in a second mask.
      class  BackgroundEstimationFilter
      A Filter that estimates the background within each region of an Image, and removes any pixels in each region that are above the estimated background for that region.
      class  BandpassFilter
      A filter that retains only a section of frequency space from an Image's Fourier transform.
      class  ConvexHullByLabelFilter
      A Filter that computes a convex hull for each region in a specified Image and converts each region to its filled convex hull.
      class  ConvolutionFilter
      Convolves a 2D x-y Image with a 2D kernel.
      class  DimensionSwappingFilter
      A filter that wraps a DimensionFlipper and swaps two of the dimensions in an image.
      class  FillFilter
      A Filter that fills in gaps in regions in a labeled mask.
      class  GaussianFilter
      A Filter that applies a gaussian blur to a 2D Image.
      class  GaussianFitFilter
      Not yet implemented.
      class  GradientFilter
      A filter that takes the gradient of a 2D Image.
      class  GradientHistogramThresholdingFilter
      A thresholding method based upon finding the full-width half-max of the histogram of the gradient of the Image.
      class  GraphJoiningFilter
      Not yet implemented.
      class  ImageSubtractionFilter
      A Filter that subtracts one image from another.
      class  InversionFilter
      A Filter that inverts an Image.
      class  KernelFilterND
      Filters an Image in an arbitrary number of dimensions using a specified kernel.
      class  Label3DFilter
      A Filter that labels connected regions in a 3D Image mask.
      class  LabelBySeedFilter
      Not yet implemented.
      class  LabelFilter
      A Filter that labels connected regions in an Image mask.
      class  LaplacianFilter
      Applies a Laplacian filter to an Image.
      class  LaplacianFilterND 
      class  LocalBackgroundEstimation3DFilter
      A Filter that estimates the background locally in an Image, using a local mean filtering approach.
      class  LocalBackgroundEstimationFilter
      A Filter that estimates the background locally in an Image, using a local median filtering approach.
      class  LocalMaximumSeparabilityThresholdingFilter
      A Filter that thresholds an Image using a modified Otsu's method.
      class  MaskFilter
      A Filter that applies a mask to an Image.
      class  MaximumSeparabilityThresholdingFilter
      A Filter that thresholds an Image using Otsu's method.
      class  MergeFilter
      A Filter that merges nonzero regions in a mask that are 8-connected.
      class  OneToOneLabelBySeedFilter
      A Filter that labels regions in a mask according to the labels in a second (seed) mask.
      class  PlaneNormalizationFilter
      Normalizes an image such that each z-plane is divided by its mean value over all other dimensions.
      class  RecursiveMaximumSeparability3DFilter
      A Filter that recursively applies a MaximumSeparabilityThresholdingFilter to each region in an Image mask (and the regions resulting from that thresholding, and so on), until every region in the Image falls withing a specified range of sizes or has been removed due to being smaller than the smallest acceptable size.
      class  RecursiveMaximumSeparabilityFilter
      A Filter that recursively applies a MaximumSeparabilityThresholdingFilter to each region in an Image mask (and the regions resulting from that thresholding, and so on), until every region in the Image falls withing a specified range of sizes or has been removed due to being smaller than the smallest acceptable size.
      class  RegionMaximumSeparabilityThresholdingFilter
      A Filter that sorts regions in a mask according to their average values in a reference image.
      class  RegionThresholdingFilter
      A Filter that thresholds an Image based on a single value for each region in a mask.
      class  RelabelFilter
      A Filter that relabels an Image mask to use a consecutive numbering.
      class  Renormalization3DFilter
      A filter that performs prefiltering on a 3D image to aid in segmentation by normalizing for local variations in image intensity.
      class  RenormalizationFilter
      A Filter that normalizes an Image by local intensity so that features that occur in a dim region of an image will be approximately the same brightness as features in a bright part of an Image.
      class  ScalespaceFilter
      Not yet implemented.
      class  SeededWatershedFilter
      A seeded version of the WatershedFilter.
      class  SeedFilter
      This class is a Filter that removes regions in one mask that do not overlap with regions in a second mask.
      class  SimpleThresholdingFilter
      A Filter that thresholds an Image at a fractional level between the minimum and the maximum value of the Image.
      class  SizeAbsoluteFilter
      A Filter that removes regions from a mask that are larger or smaller than specified size cutoffs.
      class  SizeFilter
      Not yet implemented.
      class  TimeAveragingFilter
      A filter that averages an Image over all points in the time dimension.
      class  UnionFilter
      Not yet implemented.
      class  VariableSizeMeanFilter
      Applies a QO-tree segmentation to an image and replaces pixel values with the mean over the leaf of the tree containing each pixel.
      class  VoronoiFilter 
      class  WatershedFilter
      A Filter that segments an Image according to the standard Watershed method.
      class  ZeroPointFilter
      A filter that adjusts the image values to make the minimum value zero if there are negative values in the image, and otherwise leaves the image unchanged.

      Method parameters in edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.method with type arguments of type Filter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Method.iterateOnFiltersAndStoreResult(List<Filter> filters, WritableImage toProcess, Metric m)
      Runs through a sequence of Filters and applies them successively to an input image; quantifies images according to the supplied metric and the mask that results from application of the filters.
